rules: NEVER modify .env file unless explicitly requested by user
ALWAYS assume user is running 'npm run dev' or 'pnpm dev' for local preview
ALWAYS use .env.local for environment variables during development
ONLY modify local files - never touch production files
ALWAYS show diffs for approval before making changes
Deployment only happens when user explicitly pushes to GitHub
Assume user is working locally with hot reload enabled
When editing environment-related code, prioritize .env.local in development mode
Never commit or push changes unless explicitly requested

deployment.note: Deployment is manual and only happens when user pushes to GitHub. Never attempt automatic deployment.

environment.note: Use .env.local for all local development. Production uses .env which is managed separately.
